symptoms: small, round to elongated reddish-brown pustules on both leaf surfaces, scattered patches.
treatment: use resistant hybrids, apply fungicides like mancozeb or propiconazole if severe.

symptoms: narrow, rectangular gray to tan lesions between leaf veins, severe infection causes early leaf death.
treatment: crop rotation, resistant hybrids, fungicides like azoxystrobin or trifloxystrobin.

symptoms: no disease symptoms, green healthy leaves.
cigar-shaped gray-green lesions, later tan with dark borders.
treatment: resistant hybrids, fungicides like mancozeb, tebuconazole, or azoxystrobin.

symptoms: dark brown concentric rings on old leaves, yellowing, leaf drop in severe cases.
treatment: spray mancozeb or chlorothalonil, use certified seed tubers.
no treatment, ensure good irrigation and nutrition.

symptoms: water-soaked dark lesions, white fungal growth on undersides in humid weather.
treatment: spray metalaxyl+mancozeb or cymoxanil+mancozeb at 7â€“10 day intervals, remove infected plants.

symptoms: small, oval dark brown spots with yellow halos on leaves and seeds.
treatment: treat seed, spray mancozeb or propiconazole, maintain balanced fertilization.
no treatment, maintain spacing and irrigation.

symptoms: spindle-shaped lesions with gray centers and brown margins.
treatment: spray tricyclazole or isoprothiolane, avoid excess nitrogen, proper spacing.

symptoms: panicle neck turns brown/black, unfilled or partially filled panicles.
treatment: spray tricyclazole at booting and flowering, use resistant varieties.

symptoms: small orange-brown pustules on leaves and stems.
treatment: spray propiconazole or mancozeb, grow resistant varieties.
no treatment, maintain hygiene and irrigation.

symptoms: yellow linear stripes of powdery pustules during cool wet weather.
treatment: spray tebuconazole or propiconazole, grow resistant varieties, monitor fields.

symptoms: red streaks on leaves, stalk pith red with sour smell.
treatment: destroy infected clumps, resistant varieties, fungicide-treated setts.

symptoms: green and tall canes, no disease.
treatment: no treatment, maintain nutrition and irrigation.

symptoms: yellowish-white streaks from tip, leaves dry early.
treatment: use disease-free setts, hot water treatment, resistant varieties.
